Title: Grim Reaper
Writer: Taku Kishimoto (composition), Taku Kishimoto (screenplay), Kei Sambe (manga), Alexander Von David (english script)
Actors: Chinatsu Akasaki, Ryan Bartley, Christine Marie Cabanos, Jade Dennis
Plot: Satoru follows the only clue left behind by his mother , while it does prove useful Satoru struggles to stay one step ahead of the police.
